summary: A man embarks on a road trip to find his lost love.
cast: Deepika Padukone|Naseeruddin Shah|Basilo Dias|Kevin D'Mello|Urcelina Mascarenhas|Dimple Kapadia|Ankur Tewari|Anjali Patil|Ranveer Singh|Meher Verma|Pankaj Kapur|Anand Tiwari|Arjun Kapoor|Libert Olivera|Rithika Po|Calsay Albuquerque|Rihija Govekar|Natalie Sealy|Blisscia Fernandes|Riona Po|Vedant Govekar|Mark D'Souza|Digvesh Parab|Sahil Belekar|Shreyash Sawant|Sherwyn Misquitta|Mihai Fusu|Rosario Band|Anya Bostock|Muhammad Kaif|Sonja Appel|The Panjim Band|Bond Braganza|Girish Salgaonkar|Nandita Bandyopadyay|Mohan Deshprabhu|Winston Bento Travasso
title: Finding Fanny
